title: More Early-Stage Funding Flows To Climate Fintech And Finance - Crunchbase News
content: More Early-Stage Funding Flows To Climate Fintech And Finance  Crunchbase News
description: We’ve been following startups at the intersection of fintech and climate, an area that’s seen rising funding in recent months for offerings that include carbon-tracking business software, environmentally friendly online banking, and products that make it easier to value ESG assets.
